vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A Babylonian official of Samgar, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.39.3a
§ Nergal-sharezer = "prince of fire"
chief soothsayer and a ruler in the army of Nebuchadnezzar
vocabinfos._es_Definition: funcionario; en tiempos del rey Nabucodonosor
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼甲•沙利薛 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "火王子"
一位尼布甲尼撒王軍隊的首席占卜官和首領
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
尼甲•沙利薛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "火王子"
一位尼布甲尼撒王军队的首席占卜官和首领

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A Babylonian official living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.39.3b
§ Nergal-sharezer = "prince of fire"
chief soothsayer and a ruler in the army of Nebuchadnezzar
